responses: Hello! How can I assist you
You're welcome! I'm here to help.

We offer the following courses:
1. Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
2. Chemical Engineering
3. Computer Engineering
4. Electronics and Telecommunications Engineering
5. Information Technology

The intake for 2024-25 is as follows:
1. Artificial Intelligence and Data Science: 120 seats (NRI Quota: 06)
2. Chemical Engineering: 60 seats (NRI Quota: 03)
3. Computer Engineering: 180 seats (NRI Quota: 09)
4. Electronics and Telecommunications Engineering: 60 seats
5. Information Technology: 120 seats

Thadomal Shahani Engineering College (TSEC) was established in 1983 and is recognized by the Government of Maharashtra. It is approved by the AICTE and affiliated with the University of Mumbai. TSEC offers a 4-year Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) Degree program in various disciplines and also provides a Ph.D. program in Information Technology, Computer Engineering, and Electronics & Telecommunication.

TSEC has a strong track record of placing graduating students in leading enterprises. More than 90 companies offer campus placements to our graduates. Our programs have been accredited by the National Board of Accreditation. The college also has a system in place to integrate emerging areas in engineering into the curriculum.

Online applications are invited from eligible candidates for admission to the first year of our 4-year degree courses in engineering. Applications and the prospectus are available on our website: www.tsecadmission.org.
You can contact us at the following numbers: 9967255590, 9987111590.
The institute code for Thadomal Shahani Engineering College is EN3182.
TSEC has a successful placement record with historic average pay packages. More than 90 companies offer campus placements to our graduates.
